description:
The anime's college rugby story centers on Natsusa Yuzuki, who expects to be an ace on the rugby team when he enrolls in college. However, he is no longer able to play rugby due to certain circumstances. Ibuki Ueoka is an older fellow student who quit rugby. Yasunari Tsuru is a younger student who finds Natsusa disagreeable. Yuu Mashiro is a younger student who admires and follows Natsusa. Seiichirou Shingyou is Natsusa's close childhood friend. Together, they compete in the Kansai university rugby league.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: ナンバー・トゥーフォー

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Rugby
tags.description: Centers around the sport of rugby.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

- Milo Maurizio - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)

Born in the outskirts of Munich, she discovered her passion for Japanese popular culture at a very early age. She turned her hobby into a profession after studying Japanese Studies at Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität in Munich and Gakushuin Women's College in Tokyo.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 2 - The Weight of a Wallet and the Wallet's Owner is Proportional
Episode 3 - I moved into a big house, but can't get it all put away... Things keep piling up.
Episode 4 - I can't win against a person who enjoys everything so seriously.
Episode 6 - A novice cook will fail at food arrangement almost 100% of the time.
Episode 8 - The goal and method often gets muddled in the process.
Episode 9 - Carbonic acid hot springs aren't too hot, so you can stay in them a long time.
Episode 10 - Chicken tempura tastes the best right after being fried.
Episode 11 - When watching rugby in winter, dress as warmly as possible!!
